text: "Every Beat of My Heart" is a 1986 song by Rod Stewart and is the title track to his 14th studio album Every Beat of My Heart. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and Ireland, number 83 in the United States, number 20 in South Africa, number 32 in New Zealand, number 11 in Switzerland and the Netherlands and number 95 in Canada. ==Track listings== 7-inch single :A. "Every Beat of My Heart" :B. "Trouble" 12-inch single :A1. "Every Beat of My Heart" (Tartan mix) :B1. "Trouble" :B2. "Every Beat of My Heart" (LP version) Limited-edition 12-inch single :A1. "Every Beat of My Heart" (Tartan mix) :A2. "Trouble" :B1. "Some Guys Have All the Luck" (live at Wembley Stadium, 5 July 1986) :B2. "I Don't Want to Talk About It" (live at Wembley Stadium, 5 July 1986) == References == Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rod Stewart songs
title: Every Beat of My Heart (Rod Stewart song)
